Class AddProductController

java.lang.Object
com.example.c482software1project.AddProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
class controls the logic and function of the add product scene.
Author:
Anthony Collins.
